properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY R WHERE R.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) REPLY_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT B.*, MEMBER_NM FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT R.*, MEMBER_NM FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ?, BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = ? WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
